Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a problem involving people communicating over long distances.
The student can depict a device designed to solve the problem using light or sound, such as a string telephone.
The student can show how the device is made from materials provided and that it can send or receive information over a specific distance.
The student can represent that the device uses sound to communicate.
The student can evaluate and illustrate how the device provides a solution to the communication problem.
The student can demonstrate understanding of how communicating over long distances helps people.
